name: Treasure and Bombs
description:
You are a pirate ARRRRRRGHHH
find your tresure or EXPLODE MUAHAHAHA

In Treasure and Bombs you are a pirate that lost your chest buried in the Cursed Skull Island. You have to dig as fast as you can to find it! But there are cursed skulls around the island and you have to avoid them so beware!

With the classical Minesweeper mechanic, you can avoid the cursed skulls looking at the numbers of the Gravestones.

- Instructions - 

Move - Arrow Keys

SPACE - Dig

Developed during the Global Game Jam 2021

Theme - Lost and Found
